item.description:
Today I found out that museum of science has free film Fridays in January and this is the last week.

I am planning to go 5.30 PM show with my colleague after work.

Movie : "Fly me to the Moon -3D space show attraction" , time 5.30 PM -20 min show
2nd one : Antarctica or Amazon

You can watch two shows and tickets are first come first served on Friday at the box. MOS is close to my work and I will try to get more than one ticket depending on responses. If I can't get tickets then I will cancel the meeup with update.

Note : Saturday meetup I scheduled is still up. I may go to Ice skating at Kendal after the movie. Let me know by if any one wants to join for Ice skating
http://www.kendallsqu...
item.name: Free Film Friday
